problem_text_cn: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,AE:EB=1:2,如果S~△AEF~=4cm²,那么S~△DCF~=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, AE:EB=N_0:N_1,如果S~△AEF~=N_2cm²,then S~△DCF~ = ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD为平行四边形,∴AB=CD,AB∥CD,∵AE:EB=1:2,∴AE:AB=1:3,∴AE:CD=1:3,∵AE∥CD,∴△AEF∽△CDF,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupAEF}}{S_{\bigtriangleupCDF}}=(\frac{AE}{CD})²=\frac{1}{9},∴S~△DCF~=9×=4cm²=36cm²．故选:C．
